Package de.oth.blocklib.disasters.earthquakes

Class Earthquake

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.Disaster
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.ChunkAllocatingDisaster
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.earthquakes.Earthquake
public class Earthquake
extends ChunkAllocatingDisaster
The Earthquake Disaster. A ChunkAllocatingDisaster during which multiple quakes cause the camera to shake while a Fissure is created.
Author:
Tobias Mueller

  • Constructor Details

    • Earthquake

      public Earthquake​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f center, float magnitude)
      Creates a new Earthquake. Should be added to a DisasterManager, so it gets automatically updated.
      Parameters:
      center - the center of the earthquake
      magnitude - the power of the earthquake. should be in range from 1 to 10;

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(float deltaTime)
      Description copied from class: Disaster
      Method that can be overwritten to include functionality that should be called once in every frame of the BlockLib.
      Specified by:
      update in class Disaster
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time that has passed since the last update.

      public DefinedArea getEffectArea()
      Overrides:

    • onAllocationFinished

      public void onAllocationFinished()
      Description copied from class: ChunkAllocatingDisaster
      Can be overridden to add functionality. Is called once, when all required Chunks were successfully created.
